about_the_game:
Choose Your Zodiac Freely and Unique Abilities

Write your own destiny in Moons Creed! Your choice of zodiac is filled with unique abilities that shape your gameplay. Each zodiac not only offers you powerful features but also adds strategic depth and variety. Discover the powers of your zodiac to determine your combat style and approach.

Dynamic Moon Phases: A New Game Every Turn

In Moons Creed, the Moon is a vibrant force that affects your cards and strategy every turn. With changing moon phases, each game offers a different experience. Use the power of the Moon strategically against your opponents.

Karma System: The Weight of Your Choices

The karma system forms the soul of Moons Creed. Your choices directly influence the flow of the game and the events you encounter. Both good and bad actions become turning points in the fate of your game. This deep and interactive system highlights the importance of every decision.

Elemental Regions and Diverse Enemies

Fire, Water, Earth, and Air... Each elemental region will present you with different enemies and challenges. Continuously develop your strategies to survive and triumph in these tough regions. Each area invites you to new adventures and trials.

High Replayability and Rich Events

Moons Creed calls you to a new adventure every playthrough. With different zodiac combinations, variable moon phases, and karma options, each game follows a different path. Moreover, diversity is not limited to these; rich and interactive events turn each playthrough into a unique story. This immersive world offers you new reasons to explore time and again.

name: Moon's Creed Demo
short_description: Choose your hero, trust in your zodiac, gather your cards, and shape your destiny in a unique journey
